original_text: Therefore this iniquity shall be to you as a breach ready to fall, swelling out in a high wall, whose breaking cometh suddenly at an instant.
korean_text: 이 죄악이 너희에게 마치 무너지려고 터진 담이 불쑥 나와 순식간에 무너짐 같게 되리라 하셨은즉

sentences.original_text: Therefore this iniquity shall be to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 이 불의가 너에게 있을 것이라

sentences.original_text: as a breach ready to fall
swelling out in a high wall
